name: @pooltogether/api-pool-updater
description: A worker to keep the KV fresh for pools

scripts.publish-all: yarn publish-mainnet && yarn publish-rinkeby && yarn publish-polygon && yarn publish-binance && yarn publish-celo
scripts.publish-binance: rm -rf dist && rm -rf worker && wrangler publish --env binance
scripts.publish-polygon: rm -rf dist && rm -rf worker && wrangler publish --env polygon
scripts.publish-rinkeby: rm -rf dist && rm -rf worker && wrangler publish --env rinkeby
scripts.publish-mainnet: rm -rf dist && rm -rf worker && wrangler publish --env mainnet
scripts.publish-celo: rm -rf dist && rm -rf worker && wrangler publish --env celo

author: PoolTogether <hello@pooltogether.com>
